Title: Ideal high-level outlet flue kit
Description: It may be tempting to opt for a low cost spare part, but do consider the impact that this may have. Counterfeit parts are typically substandard, manufactured from poor quality materials thus impacting on the design and strength of the product. In the event of a system failure or - in a worst case scenario, an accident - the ultimate responsibility lies with the service and repair engineer rather than the product which was ill-chosen for the application. It is always reccommended you go for an official part, such as this one.

Title: Ideal Gas Valve gas valve plug assembly
Description: An Ideal replacement part, this gas valve plug assembly is suitable for use in Ideal Super commercial boilers. The gas valve is employed in the distribution of gas.
